intro.title: I've been working with design and technology for 10 years
intro.description: I'm looking for more and more interesting and challenging projects, I always end up trying to take risks to get even greater results than I can expect. I believe that behind great projects there are extraordinary people who work as a single team, with a single common purpose and that is what attracts me the most! Meet extraordinary professionals and surround myself with good people.

design.description: Thinking about every detail of how to build a product that will add value to both the company and the people who will use it. I think like a designer, but I have the soul of someone in business, because, at the end of the day, if the interface is just ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù and doesn't bring results, my work has not reached its goals. I try more and more to participate in brilliant ideas and lead people to become better professionals, I believe that I develop more and more and am surprised by the new talents that I find during my journey and that motivates me to go further.

engineer.description: Conceiving an idea that even before was on ‚Äúpaper‚Äù, giving life to interactions and conceiving experiences that were created together with the designers. To develop authentic software that will ‚Äúfrighten‚Äù the competition! Technology, every day, advances at a gigantic speed! I believe that we are still experiencing the beginning of a future with endless possibilities. I always maintain study and practice periods so that I can add knowledge to colleagues and teams at all times.

myself.description: I work to give my children a good future! I'm very attached to animals in general, I ended up falling for IT because it was easy with my skills (apart from a very peculiar story, if I may say so, but leave that for another time üòÇ), but if I changed areas, for sure I would be a veterinarian.

music.title: Music
music.description: I was born into a family where Rock was the boss. And since I was a child I have a passion for Rock and especially Red Hot Chili Peppers. Consequently, I can't remember a single moment in my life when I haven't listened to music, since my childhood! I grew up in a very good time and managed to keep up with the best of the late 90's and everything from the 00's! But I also tend to listen to different styles of rock, rap, hip-hop, blues and reggae.

read.title: Reading
read.description: I've read several books on Design, Business, Technology and Biographies that have helped me in many ways and that have brought inspiration or even changed my way of thinking about some subjects. But now nothing is better than reading (or watching)...
